title: Aurelion Sol skin "Arcadian Sol"
body:
this would be a new skin for our buddy ol pal Aurelion sol {{champion:136}} 
http://imgur.com/KzONLEH
Please look at this image before continuing, thanks :D
1. 
Aurelion Sol hair thingy would become pixels and fade away, Similiar to FInal Boss Veigars cape but on a bigger scale
This would be the same for his tale that is no longer his hitbox 
 2
Aurelion Sol ultimate could look kinda like this!
https://i.gyazo.com/9683b8a1d11ef84b4cdbc5b101403355.png
3. 
His stars could possibly be space invader type of things
and his Q could be just a pixelated version of his current one ;3


(sorry if this is bad.. im new to doing suggestions)

{{champion:136}}



Obviously all of this could be changed im just saying it would be cool to have a arcade aurelion sol

replies.body: We need to focus on bigger things, such as pool party urgot {{champion:6}} {{item:3070}}
oooh the rolls of fat in a bikini i can see it already  {{champion:6}}
arcade aurelion sol is A better name like the other arcade skins like mf riven sona{{champion:6}}  {{champion:136}}
Riot hasnt put a play on words in ages so this would be cool
ayy froxah your waiifus friend arent you?
